title: Ticket #4118: limits for condor_mail facility
description:
condor can easily be a mail bomb by configuring notify_user and notificaiton... There should be a good way of limiting where the email is allowed to go.

Ken Hahn mentioned that he could easily see as the university goes to o365 that condor mail bombing could easily cause MS to rate-limit our connection.. bringing things down to slow for everybody at the UW.

Something like a regex match requirement to force or disallow the use of a certain mail server would potentially solve this problem.

The alternative to use IM or some other notification mechanism rather than email is another way.
